Interface ChatDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
ChatDAOPostgres
public interface ChatDAO
DAO interface for managing Chat entities.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Chat
    createChat(int idRequest, int idUserSeller, int idUserBuyer)
    Creates a new chat in the database.
    List<Chat>
    getAllChats(int idUser)
    Retrieves all chats for a given user.

  • Method Details

    • createChat

      Chat createChat(int idRequest, int idUserSeller, int idUserBuyer)
      Creates a new chat in the database.
      Parameters:
      idRequest - The ID of the related request.
      idUserSeller - The ID of the seller.
      idUserBuyer - The ID of the buyer.
      Returns:
      The created Chat object.

    • getAllChats

      List<Chat> getAllChats(int idUser)
      Retrieves all chats for a given user.
      Parameters:
      idUser - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      A list of Chat objects.
